level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-594, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 11725).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-52, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1241.
